docs.lead_paragraph: Orthodontics is sweet work. It is lucrative ($70 to $80 an hour), clean (little blood), regular (no emergencies), happy (nobody dies or experiences great pain), satisfying. The finished product smiles a lot. A typically affable orthodontist in Greenwich, Conn., admits that he entered the field after several years as a general dentist because he liked making.

headline.main: BITE; Parent and Child: A child's garden of malocclusion

docs.abstract: Marcia Cohen article on orthodontics; describes orthodontics as lucrative business; compares European to Amer methods; describes various orthodontic devices; comments on selection of orthodontist; illus (L)
